_aChangeLog.text: Now cant double-boost on diamond stage
Now forced to complete the 2nd part of diamond stage in its entirety
Tunnel connecting 1st and 2nd part of diamond stage was made more speed friendly

_sText:
My first map, decided to theme it around League of Legends. 

Intended for auto but possible on all styles (there are slow skip routes for the last 2 parts). Gameplay is a fluid spreedrun from start to finish with many major inbuilt skips and I'm estimating global to be around the 3 minute mark. Difficulty is about a hard T5 otherwise using the skip routes I'd say a T3 (rating out of 6 tiers). I still wanted to add more to this map (Elo hell stage , more interesting alternate skip routes, seperate master / challenger stages etc.) however I've reached the brushlimit. Porting this map was much easier than I thought it would be which is why I did it when I said I wouldn't anytime soon (http://gamebanana.com/maps/192355). The 2nd part of the diamond stage may be a little confusing on where to go the first time round, so here's a quickly thrown together video on how to do it: https://youtu.be/SQQWKo6Jtbw
 
Thanks to Biql, Roger, and Saving Private Pyle for helping me when I got stuck with hammer issues. Thanks to TopHattWaffle and Saspatoon for their texture packs, used it for about 80% of my map.

Finally thanks to xXLoliMaster69 for playtesting / giving feedback on the global route

Good Luck Have fun.
